summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當會開啟存放區中，結果由物件。When an store is opened, the result is represented by an object. 如果您熟悉的未受管理的密碼編譯 API 建構，您可以考慮當做記憶體存放區的物件。If you are familiar with the unmanaged Cryptographic API constructs, you can think of an as a memory store of objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者的個人憑證存放區、 選取有效的憑證、 可讓使用者選取憑證，然後將憑證和憑證鏈結的資訊寫入至主控台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 輸出取決於使用者選取的憑證。The output depends on the certificate the user selects. [!code-cpp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會加入物件加入至集合，並傳回憑證的索引位置。This method adds an object to a collection and returns the index location of the certificate. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以搭配 PFX/PKCS12 二進位大型物件 (BLOB) 受到密碼保護。This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 binary large object (BLOB) protected by a password. 您可以建立 PFX/PKCS12 BLOB 中的憑證與相關聯的金鑰容器和值可用來控制這個程序。Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 BLOB can be created and the value can be used to control this process. 請注意，是否您未建立的金鑰容器，私用金鑰不會保存。Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted. 這個方法會的憑證集合中，匯入憑證的位元組陣列。This method imports a certificate byte array into a collection of certificates. 這個方法支援下列類型：This method supports the following types: - - - - -

summary.span: 將需要密碼的憑證檔匯入 物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以搭配 PFX/PKCS12 檔或其他憑證檔案，需要密碼。This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 file or other certificate files that require a password. 您可以建立 PFX/PKCS12 檔案中的憑證與相關聯的金鑰容器和值可用來控制這個程序。Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 file can be created and value can be used to control this process. 請注意，是否您未建立的金鑰容器，私用金鑰不會保存。Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted. 請注意 PFX/PKCS12 檔可以包含多個憑證。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 file can contain more than one certificate. 這個方法會匯入私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果沒有私密金鑰找到，找到的第一個憑證。This method imports the first certificate associated with the private key or, if no private key is found, the first certificate found. 這個方法支援下列類型：This method supports the following types: - - - - - -

summary.span: 移除 物件中的第一個憑證。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a certificate from the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會移除第一個出現的憑證。This method removes the first occurrence of a certificate.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 移除 物件中的多個 物件。

span.span: Removes multiple objects from an object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveRange(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2[] certificates) cil managed

param.name: certificates
param.span: 物件的陣列。

span.span: An array of objects.

summary.span: 將陣列中的多個 物件從 物件中移除。

span.span: Removes multiple objects in an array from an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法，如果您有陣列物件以移除從物件。Use this method if you have an array of objects to remove from an object. 和方法處理要求交易，因此，如果單一加入或移除失敗，整個作業已中止。The and methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.

summary.span: 將 物件中的多個 物件從另一個 物件中移除。

span.span: Removes multiple objects in an object from another object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您已將憑證使用這個方法您想要從另一個移除的物件物件。Use this method if you have certificates in an object that you want to remove from another object. 和方法處理要求交易，因此，如果單一加入或移除失敗，整個作業已中止。The and methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
